title: For my Master
description: Young college graduate Cynthia Storm wants to continue her studies to obtain a Master's degree, but has no way of paying for it. Unmotivated and unprepared, she finds herself interviewing for a job she doesn't want with handsome billionaire Nathan Jones.His Dominant nature and enticing looks make it hard for her to say 'No' when he comes up with an attractive He offers to support her studies financially - but wants to own her as his submissive in return.This steamy Romance contains explicit BDSM scenes and is aimed at audiences 18+. It is a standalone with no cliffhangers and a HEA ending.
author: Linnea May
